article_title: Clinica Esperanza: Hope and care for those who can't afford insurance
article_text: Sign up for our newsletter and have the top headlines from your community delivered right to your inbox

article_metadata.description: The clinic sees about 2,000 to 2,500 patients a year and estimates that it has saved them from nearly $600,000 in out-of-pocket costs had they gone to the emergency room.
article_metadata.author: Richard Salit
